keys: Artes visuales. Pintura y color. Plan de lección
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3405</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Looking at Paintings</string>
            <string language="es">Mirar pinturas</string>
            <string language="ga">Ag Féachaint ar Phictiúir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrachten der Anstriche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regarder des peintures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhando pinturas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guardando le pitture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξέταση τα έργα ζωγραφικής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Looking at paintings, or other works in colour, is an activity which is suitable for all age groups.</string>
            <string language="es">Mirar pinturas u otros trabajos en color es una actividad apropiada para todos los grupos de edad.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is gníomhaíocht ghrúpa é féachaint ar phictiúir, nó saothair eile i ndath, atá feiliunach do gach aoisghrúpa.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales. Pintura y color. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Paint and Colour</string>
            <string language="ga">Péint agus Dath</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anstriche oder andere Arbeiten in der Farbe 
betrachtend, ist eine Aktivität, die für alle Altersklassen 
verwendbar ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regardant des peintures, ou d'autres travaux en 
couleurs, est une activité qui convient à toutes les catégories 
d'âge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olhando pinturas, ou outros trabalhos na cor, é 
uma atividade que seja apropriada para todos os grupos de idade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guardando le pitture, o altri impianti a colori, 
è un'attività che è adatta a tutti i gruppi d'età.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εξέταση τα έργα ζωγραφικής, ή άλλες εργασίες στο 
χρώμα, είναι μια δραστηριότητα που είναι κατάλληλη για όλες τις 
ομάδες ηλικίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe und Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peinture et couleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pintura e cor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
